Name: temperature
Common values: Inlet pipe: :math:`70 - 130 ^\circ C`, Return pipe: :math:`50 - 70 ^\circ C`

Name: spec. heat capacity
Common values: :math:`4190\,J/(kgK)` at :math:`80^\circ C` and PN16 or PN25

Name: dynamic viscosity
Common values: :math:`0.00035\,kg/(m \cdot s)` at :math:`80^\circ C` and PN16 or PN25
